ARTICLE VIII
Subcontracting
The Contractor must hare advance authorization of the Contracting
Officer for any proposed subcontract or purchase order hereunder which
is on a cost or cost-plus a fixed fee basis, and of any fixed price
subcontract or purchase order which exceeds in dollar value % of the
total estimated cost of the prime contract.
ARTICLE IX
Attachments
The attached Fora IA-355 (Rev.) "General Conditions" is incorporated
herein and made a part hereof.
